name: The Joy Luck Club
tagline: The life histories of four Asian women and their daughters reflect and guide each other.

name: Drillbit Taylor
tagline: Three kids hire a low-budget bodyguard to protect them from the playground bully.

name: Team America: World Police

production.name: MMDP Munich Movie Development & Production GmbH & Co. Project KG

tagline: Popular Broadway actor Gary Johnston is recruited by the elite counter-terrorism organization Team America: World Police. As the world begins to crumble around him, he must battle with terrorists, celebrities and falling in love.

name: Striptease
tagline: A stripper and single mother gets dragged into a dangerous situation after a congressman takes a fancy to her.

name: Hereafter
tagline: A drama centered on three people -- a blue-collar American, a French journalist and a London school boy -- who are touched by death in different ways.

name: The Last House on the Left
tagline: After kidnapping and brutally assaulting two young women, a gang led by a prison escapee unknowingly finds refuge at a vacation home belonging the parents of one of the victims -- a mother and father who devise an increasingly gruesome series of revenge tactics.

name: Homeward Bound 2: Lost in San Francisco
tagline: Shadow, Sassy, and Chance have to find their way home after they become stranded at the San Francisco International Airport as their owners fly to Canada on vacation.

name: Dreamer: Inspired by a True Story
tagline: Cale Crane catalyzes the rescue and rehabilitation of Sonador, a race horse with a broken leg.

name: Tommy Boy
tagline: An incompetent, immature, and dimwitted heir to an auto parts factory must save the business to keep it out of the hands of his new, con-artist relatives and big business.

name: The 13th Warrior
tagline: In A.D. 922, an Arab ambassador is exiled from his homeland and ends up meeting a group of warrior Norseman, who he soon discovers he is destined join.

name: Taking Lives
tagline: An FBI profiler is called in by French Canadian police to catch a serial killer who takes on the identity of each new victim.

name: When in Rome
tagline: Beth is a young, ambitious New Yorker who is completely unlucky in love. However, on a whirlwind trip to Rome, she impulsively steals some coins from a reputed fountain of love, and is then aggressively pursued by a band of suitors.

name: Return to Me
tagline: A man who falls in love with the woman who received his wife's heart must decide which woman it is who holds his heart.

name: Because of Winn-Dixie
tagline: A mischievous dog befriends a lonely young girl in a new town and helps her make new friends.

name: The Accidental Tourist
tagline: An emotionally distant writer of travel guides must carry on with his life after his son is killed and his marriage crumbles.

name: Driven
tagline: A young hot shot driver is in the middle of a championship season and is coming apart at the seams. A former CART champion is called in to give him guidance.

name: Friday the 13th: The Final Chapter
tagline: After being mortally wounded and taken to the morgue, murderer Jason Voorhees spontaneously revives and embarks on a killing spree as he makes his way back to his home at Camp Crystal Lake.

name: Proof of Life
tagline: Alice hires a professional negotiator to obtain the release of her engineer husband, who has been kidnapped by anti-government guerrillas in South America.

name: Just Friends
tagline: While visiting his hometown during Christmas, a man comes face-to-face with his old high school crush whom he was best friends with -- a woman whose rejection of him turned him into a ferocious womanizer.

name: Mr. Bean's Holiday
tagline: Mr. Bean wins a trip to Cannes where he unwittingly separates a young boy from his father and must help the two come back together. On the way he discovers France, bicycling, and true love, among other things.

name: Bend It Like Beckham
tagline: The daughter of orthodox Sikh rebels against her parents' traditionalism by running off to Germany with a football team (soccer in America).

name: Hard Target
tagline: A woman hires a drifter as her guide through New Orleans in search of her father, who has gone missing. They discover a deadly game of cat and mouse behind his disappearance in the process.

name: Almost Famous
tagline: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies it on their concert tour.

name: The Pianist
tagline: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

name: Jungle Fever
tagline: Friends and family of a married black architect react in different ways to his affair with an Italian secretary.

name: Under the Sea 3D
tagline: An underwater look at the diverse coastal regions of Southern Australia, New Guinea and the Indo-Pacific areas and the impact of global warming on the oceans.

name: October Sky
tagline: The true story of Homer Hickam, a coal miner's son who was inspired by the first Sputnik launch to take up rocketry against his father's wishes.

name: The Men Who Stare at Goats
tagline: A reporter in Iraq might just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the U.S. Army's New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

name: (500) Days of Summer
tagline: An offbeat romantic comedy about a woman who doesn't believe true love exists, and the young man who falls for her.

name: Black Sheep
tagline: A gubernatorial candidate hires a wormy special assistant whose only job is to make sure the candidate's well-meaning but incompetent brother doesn't ruin the election.

name: Bride of Chucky
tagline: Chucky, the doll possessed by a serial killer, discovers the perfect mate to kill and revive into the body of another doll.

name: Love & Other Drugs
tagline: A young woman suffering from Parkinson's befriends a drug rep working for Pfizer in 1990s Pittsburgh.

name: Léon: The Professional
tagline: A professional assassin rescues a young girl whose family were killed in a police raid.

name: Rumble in the Bronx
tagline: A young man visiting and helping his uncle in New York City finds himself forced to fight a street gang and the mob with his martial art skills.

name: Nothing in Common
tagline: A successful ad man (Hanks) must juggle his ever-demanding career while his parents' marriage breaks up.

name: Kevin Hart: Let Me Explain
tagline: Filmed at a sold-out performance at Madison Square Garden, comedian Kevin Hart delivers material from his 2012 "Let Me Explain" concert tour.

name: The Lost Boys
tagline: After moving to a new town, two brothers are convinced that the area is frequented by vampires.

name: The Love Guru
tagline: Pitka an American raised outside of his country by gurus, returns to the States in order to break into the self-help business. His first challenge: To settle the romantic troubles and subsequent professional skid of a star hockey player whose wife left him for a rival athlete.

name: Side Effects
tagline: A young woman's world unravels when a drug prescribed by her psychiatrist has unexpected side effects.

name: Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within
tagline: A scientist makes a last stand on Earth with the help of a ragtag team of soldiers against an invasion of alien phantoms.

name: Darkness Falls
tagline: A vengeful spirit has taken the form of the Tooth Fairy to exact vengeance on the town that lynched her 150 years earlier. Her only opposition is the only child, now grown up, who has survived her before.

name: Analyze That
tagline: Mobster Paul Vitti is released into Dr. Ben Sobol's care, where only more chaos ensues.

name: The Lawnmower Man
tagline: A simple man is turned into a genius through the application of computer science.

name: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
tagline: A rich man catches a thief burglarizing his home and steals the thief's lucky ring, who then tries to get it back.

name: The Accused
tagline: After a young woman suffers a brutal rape in a bar one night, a prosecutor assists in bringing the perpetrators to justice, including the ones who encouraged and cheered on the attack.

name: Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium
tagline: Molly Mahoney is the awkward and insecure manager of Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium, the strangest, most fantastic, most wonderful toy store in the world. But when Mr. Magorium, the 243 year-old eccentric who owns the store, bequeaths the store to her, a dark and ominous change begins to take over the once remarkable Emporium.

name: The Shadow
tagline: In 30's New York City, the Shadow battles his nemesis, Shiwan Khan, who is building an atomic bomb.

name: Copycat
tagline: An agoraphobic psychologist and a female detective must work together to take down a serial killer who copies serial killers from the past.

name: House of Wax
tagline: A group of unwitting teens are stranded near a strange wax museum and soon must fight to survive and keep from becoming the next exhibit.

name: Scary Movie 5
tagline: A couple begin to experience some unusual activity after bringing their lost nieces and nephew home. With the help of home-surveillance cameras, they learn they're being stalked by a nefarious demon.

name: Cellular
tagline: A young man receives an emergency phone call on his cell phone from an older woman. The catch? The woman claims to have been kidnapped; and the kidnappers have targeted her husband and child next.

name: Psycho II
tagline: After twenty-two years of psychiatric care, Norman Bates attempts to return to a life of solitude... but the specters of his crimes -- and his mother -- continue to haunt him.

name: Psycho
tagline: A Phoenix secretary steals $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

name: The Age of Innocence
tagline: Tale of 19th century New York high society in which a young lawyer falls in love with a woman separated from her husband, while he is engaged to the woman's cousin.

name: Definitely, Maybe
tagline: A political consultant tries to explain his impending divorce and past relationships to his 11-year-old daughter.

name: Leaving Las Vegas
tagline: Ben Sanderson, an alcoholic Hollywood screenwriter who lost everything because of his drinking, arrives in Las Vegas to drink himself to death. There, he meets and forms an uneasy friendship and non-interference pact with prostitute Sera.

name: Lean on Me
tagline: The dedicated but tyrannical Joe Clark is appointed the principal of a decaying inner-city school that he is determined to improve.

name: Dressed to Kill
tagline: A mysterious, tall blonde woman murders one of a psychiatrist's patients, and then goes after the high class call girl who witnessed the murder.

name: Murder by Numbers
tagline: Two gifted high school students execute a "perfect" murder - then become engaged in an intellectual contest with a seasoned homicide detective.

name: Milk
tagline: The story of Harvey Milk, and his struggles as an American gay activist who fought for gay rights and became California's first openly gay elected official.

name: Extremely Loud & Incredibly Close
tagline: A nine-year-old amateur inventor, Francophile, and pacifist searches New York City for the lock that matches a mysterious key left behind by his father, who died in the World Trade Center on September 11, 2001.

name: Push
tagline: Two young Americans with special abilities must race to find a girl in Hong Kong before a shadowy government organization called Division does.

name: Lake Placid
tagline: Horror-Comedy about a man-eating crocodile loose in the lake.

name: The Bear
tagline: An orphan bear cub hooks up with an adult male as they try to dodge human hunters.
A rag doll that awakens in a post-apocalyptic future holds the key to humanity's salvation.

name: Stealth
tagline: Deeply ensconced in a top-secret military program, three pilots struggle to bring an artificial intelligence program under control before it initiates the next world war.

name: Quarantine
tagline: A television reporter and her cameraman are trapped inside a building quarantined by the CDC after the outbreak of a mysterious virus which turns humans into bloodthirsty killers.

name: The Soloist
tagline: A Los Angeles journalist befriends a homeless Juilliard-trained musician, while looking for a new article for the paper.

name: August Rush
tagline: A drama with fairy tale elements, where an orphaned musical prodigy uses his gift as a clue to finding his birth parents.

name: Can't Buy Me Love
tagline: A nerdy outcast secretly pays the most popular girl in school one thousand dollars to be his girlfriend.

name: For Richer or Poorer
tagline: A real estate hustler and his wife hide from the IRS among the Amish.

name: House at the End of the Street
tagline: When a teenager and her mother move to a little town, the girl finds that an accident happened in the house at the end of the street. But things get complicated when she befriends a boy who is the only survivor in the accident.

name: From Hell
tagline: In Victorian Era London, a troubled clairvoyant police detective investigates the murders by Jack The Ripper.

name: One Hour Photo
tagline: An employee of a one-hour photo lab becomes obsessed with a young suburban family.

name: The Wedding Date
tagline: Single-girl anxiety causes Kat Ellis (Messing) to hire a male escort (Mulroney) to pose as her boyfriend at her sister's wedding. Her plan, an attempt to dupe her ex-fiancé, who dumped her a couple years prior, proves to be her undoing.

name: She's Out of My League
tagline: An average Joe meets the perfect woman, but his lack of confidence and the influence of his friends and family begin to pick away at the relationship.

name: Anacondas: The Hunt for the Blood Orchid
tagline: A scientific expedition sets out for Borneo to seek a flower called the Blood Orchid, which could grant longer life. Meanwhile, they run afoul of snakes and each other.

name: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
tagline: Scott Pilgrim must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes in order to win her heart.

name: A History of Violence
tagline: A mild-mannered man becomes a local hero through an act of violence, which sets off repercussions that will shake his family to its very core.

name: Nick and Norah's Infinite Playlist
tagline: High school student Nick O'Leary, member of the Queercore band The Jerk Offs, meets college-bound Norah Silverberg when she asks him to be her boyfriend for five minutes.

name: United 93
tagline: A real time account of the events on United Flight 93, one of the planes hijacked on 9/11 that crashed near Shanksville, Pennsylvania when passengers foiled the terrorist plot.

name: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
tagline: Lifelong platonic friends Zack and Miri look to solve their respective cash-flow problems by making an adult film together. As the cameras roll, however, the duo begin to sense that they may have more feelings for each other than they previously thought.

name: The Eye
tagline: A woman receives an eye transplant that allows her to see into the supernatural world. Remake of the Hong Kong film "Jian Gui".

name: Transporter 3
tagline: Frank Martin puts the driving gloves on to deliver Valentina, the kidnapped daughter of a Ukranian government official, from Marseilles to Odessa on the Black Sea. En route, he has to contend with thugs who want to intercept Valentina's safe delivery and not let his personal feelings get in the way of his dangerous objective.

name: Monster's Ball
tagline: After a family tragedy, a racist prison guard reexamines his attitudes while falling in love with the African American wife of the last prisoner he executed.

name: Beverly Hills Ninja
tagline: An unlikely man raised by ninjas, goes against a counterfeiter with the help of the criminal's girlfriend.

name: The Adventures of the Wilderness Family
tagline: A family flees the city for a deep forest, to escape the pressures of life, and to help their sickly daughter.

name: Leatherheads
tagline: In 1925, an enterprising pro football player convinces America's too-good-to-be-true college football hero to play for his team and keep the league from going under.
